author: stringer7412
content:
Hello everyone, here's a blog post we just published on building a simple version of Ethereum in < 200 lines of Python: https://medium.com/brexeng/building-ethereum-from-scratch-in-10-minutes-fe74519ef8c8

When I first started learning Ethereum I googled around "How to build Ethereum from scratch" and found nothing. There are many blog posts explaining how to build Bitcoin from scratch (like https://hackernoon.com/learn-blockchains-by-building-one-117428612f46), but none on Ethereum, so I decided to give it a shot with the post above. Any feedback is extremely appreciated
